entry.title: EE-23 (easter bunny)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Easter
Price: 6.00

This needle felted adorable and lovely Easter ornament will create heartwarming spring atmosphere in your home. Designed in pastel colours with unique needle felted pattern. All our easter ornaments will fill your home with Easter spirit and will revive fresh hope. It is made of 100% wool by using only soap and water. 

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material.
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover.
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.

For decoration only and not intended to be used as a toy.


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.title: EE-01 (carrot easter basket)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Easter
Price: 11.00

Make this year Easter extra special with our Carrot Easter basket. Perfect for collecting lots of treats on an Easter egg hunt or simply display with Easter egg decoration. We love how carrots shape are stitched together to form a basket shape. All our easter items will fill your home with Easter spirit and will revive fresh hope. It is made of 100% wool by using only soap and water.

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material.
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover.
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.

For decoration only and not intended to be used as a toy.



Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.
